local_intent: Approach and align the end-effector precisely with the pot lid before grasping.
assumptions: Lid pose already computed and available from prior step
Camera view is stable for alignment
coherence_with_global: This subtree realizes the 'approach' phase of the global plan, matching the ApproacheAndAlign node parameters (lid, tolerance=0.005, timeout_ms=1500). It is consistent with the requirement of careful alignment before grasping.
